channel.title: [317] Need help with client, run error [317]
channel.description:
Ok so im making a client for my source. And i was adding an better granite maul model. So i was restarting my client. But it froze at the loading screen (of the server)
And i got this: [img]http://img2.imageshack.us/img2/512/helpsum.png[/img] It frozes every time i load the server.
Thanks, Roli [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 06:38:52 am[/size][hr]Sorry for double But i find the problem ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 07:08:40 am[/size][hr]Got it again... If i load granite maul or dclaws it freeze WHY ?

http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.html

^^
Learn about your problem, then, from there, assess your options.

item.description:

maybe cuz the d claws u made or g maul or whatever ur making is glitched and the height or something of the figure (d claws\g maul) is to high or something like that… it happened to me also… try making ur d claws or g maul again
